```{r}
library(readr)
```

```{r}
X29_Pokemon <- read_csv("29. Pokemon.csv")
```

```{r}
Legendarios <- subset(X29_Pokemon, Is_Legendary == TRUE)

```
```{r}
no_legendarios <- subset(X29_Pokemon, Is_Legendary == FALSE)
```

```{r}
print(Legendarios)
```
```{r}
print(no_legendarios)
```

# ahora comparo los legendarios y los no los no lejendarios.
```{r}
mean(Legendarios$Total_Stats)
```
```{r}
mean(no_legendarios$Total_Stats)
```
# ahora visualizacion
```{r}
install.packages("ggplot2")
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```
```{r}
ggplot(X29_Pokemon, aes(x = Is_Legendary, y = Total_Stats)) + geom_boxplot() + labs(tittle = "Legendarios")
```
